library(dplyr)

# Loading data

```{r data preprocessing}
protein.groups <- readr::read_tsv('proteinGroups.txt')

protein.groups <- protein.groups %>% filter(is.na(`Only identified by site`),
                         is.na(Reverse),
                         is.na(`Potential contaminant`))

LFQ <- protein.groups %>% select(`Protein IDs`, `Gene names`, 
                                 starts_with('LFQ Intensity') & (ends_with('22') | ends_with('23') | ends_with('24')))

LFQ_KO_TOTALS <- LFQ %>% select(`Protein IDs`, `Gene names`, contains('KO_TOTALS'))
LFQ_KO_MITO <- LFQ %>% select(`Protein IDs`, `Gene names`, contains('KO_MITO'))

LFQ_WT_TOTALS <- LFQ %>% select(`Protein IDs`, `Gene names`, contains('WT_TOTALS'))
LFQ_WT_MITO <- LFQ %>% select(`Protein IDs`, `Gene names`, contains('WT_MITO'))
```

```{r missing gene names}
missing <- LFQ[which(is.na(LFQ$`Gene names`)),]
```

```{r}
LFQ_rotate <- LFQ %>% sjmisc::rotate_df(cn=TRUE)
```
